description:
James Muro‘s Street Trash is an acquired taste. In a true sense, the 1987 Dark Comedy/Body Horror is a cult classic. Regular movie watchers have probably never heard of it, but at least cinephiles and hardcore horror fans have it on their radar. The film’s story and gore struck many enough people to build a [...]

The post Exclusive: Ryan Kruger Discusses ‘Street Trash’ And Another Possible Remake appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Exclusive: Ryan Kruger Discusses ‘Street Trash’ And Another Possible Remake
